channel.title: Appealing my ban
channel.description:
Yes, I understand what I did was wrong - but I really wish to be unbanned. I have put a lot of effort into Haven, and I am willing to be put on a last warning (i.e. if i break one single rule, even a small one, i get banned).
I just hope that you can give me another chance.

item.title: Appealing my ban
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

It was aimed at anyone who is a mod.

Read full topic

item.title: Appealing my ban
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

ranger squad:

David, I have already said that I only created this thread as I did not know it was only temporary - feel free to lock it.

Oddly he isn’t a mod for this section.

Read full topic

item.title: Appealing my ban
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No, this means you all grow up and get over it. He is being punished for what he did, that should be enough for you.

And Ranger, the time is probably a few weeks. This thread really isn’t helping you at all though.

Read full topic

item.title: Appealing my ban
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:17, topic:380066”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=475908.msg3480957#msg3480957 date=1296112073]

As long you don’t speak to me.
I intend on killing you, by the way.
Just don’t flip shit when I do.

I’ll help u since Cole my friend and he tried framing him
[/quote]
He framed both me and rey.[/quote]

He did to rey 2? This means war

Read full topic

item.title: Appealing my ban
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Shooting my wife and misbehaving on a minecraft server are different things completely. And the reason I created this thread is because I was under the impression it was a permanent ban. Can I have an idea of the time?

Read full topic

item.title: Appealing my ban
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I shot your wife, I am sorry. Can I get a second chance?

The answer is no. But it is a temporary ban, the time depending on how you behave. (This type of thread really doesn’t help you)

Read full topic

item.title: Appealing my ban
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:12, topic:380066”]Tabby set it up, afaik.[/quote]He didn’t I just asked him, your lies are your downfall.

item.title: Appealing my ban
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=475908.msg3480290#msg3480290 date=1296061073]
I think everybody deserves another chance, no matter what they have done. Certain situations can bring out the worst in people, nobody is perfect.
[/quote]No.

[quote author=ranger squad link=topic=475908.msg3480507#msg3480507 date=1296078805]
Why do you intend on killing me? You’re willing to break the peace treaty between our cities?
[/quote]Just because the city has a treaty, doesn’t mean Rey must follow it.[/quote]

I live in the akutsuki town. That doesn’t mean I abide by their laws.

Read full topic
